title: Schooling financial agents on 'saving money' takes poll position
description: To avoid delays, inconvenience, and a brush with the law, field officials and BCs are being told to put on their best behaviour, besides being “strongly discouraged” to carry cash beyond Rs 50,000 during the weeks of the election.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
